allowance(address,address).return: the amount of token `spender` is allowed to transfer on behalf of `owner`.

params.spender: address to be given rights to transfer.

params.target: address to be given rights to transfer and destination of the call.

params.amount: number of tokens allowed that can be transfer by the code at `to`.
params.data: the bytes sent to the destination address.
params.from: address of which token will be transfered.
params.gasLimit: exact amount of gas to be passed to the call.

approveAndExecuteWithSpecificGas(address.return: success whether the execution was successful.returnData data resulting from the execution.

approveAndExecuteWithSpecificGasAndCharg.details: the reason for this function is that charging for gas here is more gas-efficient than doing it in the caller.

params.amount: number of tokens allowed that can be transfer by the code at `to`.
params.baseGasCharge: amount of gas charged on top of the gas used for the call.
params.data: the bytes sent to the destination address.
params.from: address of which token will be transfered.
params.gasLimit: exact amount of gas to be passed to the call.
params.tokenGasPrice: price in token for the gas to be charged.
params.tokenReceiver: recipient address of the token charged for the gas used.

approveAndExecuteWithSpecificGasAndCharg.return: success whether the execution was successful.returnData data resulting from the execution.

params.spender: address to be given rights to transfer.

params.owner: The address to query the balance of.

params.amount: the number of tokens to burn.
the number of token to burn.
params.owner: address whose token is to burn.

params.data: the bytes sent to the destination address.
params.gasLimit: exact amount of gas to be passed to the call.

executeWithSpecificGas(address,uint256,b.return: success whether the execution was successful.returnData data resulting from the execution.

getAdmin().return: the current administrator of this contract.

isExecutionOperator(address).return: whether the address has executionOperator rights.

isSuperOperator(address).return: whether the address has superOperator rights.

params.amount: the number of tokens allowed to spend.
params.target: destination of the call, allowed to spend the amount specified

params.enabled: set whether the executionOperator is enabled or disabled.
params.executionOperator: address that will be given/removed executionOperator right.

params.enabled: set whether the superOperator is enabled or disabled.
params.superOperator: address that will be given/removed superOperator right.

totalSupply().return: the total number of tokens in existence.

params.to: the recipient address of the tokens transfered.

params.amount: number of tokens allowed that can be transfer by the code at `to`.
params.baseGasCharge: amount of gas charged on top of the gas used for the call.
params.from: address of which token will be transfered.
params.gasLimit: exact amount of gas to be passed to the call.
params.tokenGasPrice: price in token for the gas to be charged.
params.tokenReceiver: recipient address of the token charged for the gas used.

params.from: whose token it is transferring from.
params.to: the recipient address of the tokens transfered.

approveAndCall(address,uint256,bytes).notice: approve `target` to spend `amount` and call it with data.

approveAndExecuteWithSpecificGas(address.notice: approve a specific amount of token for `from` and execute on behalf of the contract.

approveAndExecuteWithSpecificGasAndCharg.notice: approve a specific amount of token for `from` and execute on behalf of the contract. Plus charge the gas required to perform it.

changeExecutionAdmin(address).notice: change the execution adminstrator to be `newAdmin`.

decimals().notice: returns the number of decimals for that token.

executeWithSpecificGas(address,uint256,b.notice: execute on behalf of the contract.

getAdmin().notice: gives the current administrator of this contract.

getExecutionAdmin().notice: give the address responsible for adding execution rights.

isExecutionOperator(address).notice: check whether address `who` is given executionOperator rights.

isSuperOperator(address).notice: check whether address `who` is given superOperator rights.

name().notice: A descriptive name for the tokens

paidCall(address,uint256,bytes).notice: temporarly approve `target` to spend `amount` and call it with data. Previous approvals remains unchanged.

setSuperOperator(address,bool).notice: Enable or disable the ability of `superOperator` to transfer tokens of all (superOperator rights).

symbol().notice: An abbreviated name for the tokens

totalSupply().notice: Gets the total number of tokens in existence.

transferAndChargeForGas(address,address,.notice: transfer 1amount1 token from `from` to `to` and charge the gas required to perform that transfer.
